column5: Good day. First post here (planing on leaving ff ). I am planing a trip to Lady Evelyn Park early sept. for brookie's and laker's will this be a worthy trip. Its up near Latchford. Well from what l have read on the posts it seems thier are alot more red necks hear, not to meny stuffy shirts.  Peace bowshep.
Welcome to the OFC bowshep.  Try sending a message to dwc67 about Lady Evelyn Lake. He camps and fishes up there and could probably give you some info.  Good luck.
I'm still tryin to get by the "alot more rednecks" statement! I thought we only had one!
l'm origanaly from North Bay red neck is just another word for HOME. i'm getting very disapointed in my fellow man down hear no maners and they al live with the common goal of one's self

I hear yah bowshep...I think we all know the guy you talk of ! LOL  Lady E takes some work to get into, by boat anyhow, but I've heard it's well worth it. Many other choices up there and lots of Crown land to camp on for free as well. Was a nice place for sale on Lady E this fall that I should have snagged..but..it's sold.
